coordinator_insights: Architecture pivot: coordinator does web research, agents do writing/analysis only
All 6 streams have partial data - sufficient for initial draft
Key gaps: full text of old 1968 law, specific case law on Palestinian workers, FOI responses
Salach Hassan case is about income support not NII directly - but relevant by analogy
The equalization levy is a critical mechanism worth a dedicated section in the paper

stream_1_old_law.description: חוק ביטוח לאומי ישן (תשכ"ח-1968) – הגדרת מבוטח
stream_1_old_law.summary: Collected: historical overview, differences from 1995 law, absence of section 2a, 1987 regulations context. Missing: full law text (scanned PDF only).

stream_2_new_law.description: חוק ביטוח לאומי חדש (תשנ"ה-1995) – הגדרת מבוטח + תקנות
stream_2_new_law.summary: Collected: section 2a text, resident definition, varying insured definitions by branch, insurance obligation. Missing: full law text from Nevo (requires login).

stream_3_additional_legislation.description: חקיקה נוספת: חוק יישום הסכם עזה ויריחו + חוקים נוספים המתייחסים לזכאות
stream_3_additional_legislation.summary: Collected: Gaza-Jericho law overview, section 37 NII amendment, equalization levy details, 1987 regulations, IYoSh law, 3 employment scenarios. Missing: full section 37 text, Paris Protocol provisions.

stream_4_practice.description: מה קורה בפועל: הנחיות אוצר, רשות אוכלוסין, תשובות חופש מידע
stream_4_practice.summary: Collected: insurance branches for Palestinians, 2025 rates, payment mechanisms, permit trade, pension problems, sick pay gaps, accessibility barriers. Missing: FOI responses, Treasury guidelines.

stream_5_case_law.description: פסיקה והיסטוריה: פסקי דין מרכזיים, אבני דרך
stream_5_case_law.summary: Collected: center of life test, Salach Hassan (income support analogy), East Jerusalem residents, 183-day vs center-of-life test, State Comptroller findings. Missing: specific case law on Palestinian workers NII claims.

stream_6_meta_definitions.description: מטא: תחולת החוק הישראלי, הגדרת עובד, ריבונות, דוגמאות מחוקים אחרים
stream_6_meta_definitions.summary: Collected: dual legal system in West Bank, sovereignty extension costs, IYoSh law, East Jerusalem residency. Missing: academic analysis of personal vs territorial jurisdiction.
